page.title: 05Beccles Swimming Pool
page.content: Beccles has an open air swimming pool. If it is a nice warm sunny day lots of people like to go to the swimming pool. They can swim or lie in the sun on the grass. Unfortunately at the moment there is a problem as there is a leak in the pool and engineers think that the life of the pool is coming to an end.The pool is very busy throughout the summer.It is open to the public as well as the Kingfishers smimming club.They help children to learn to swim and if the pool closes many Beccles youngsters will not learn. A new indoor pool is needed in the area but there is an arguement about which town will get it-Beccles,Bungay or Halesworth.No decision hasbeen taken yet.
